casebody.data:
Leander Taggart, Respondent, v. Edward Annan, et al., Appellants. Decided June 8, 1886. Appeal from judgment entered on verdict and from order denying motion for new trial. James 0. Bergen, for appellants. Jerome Buck, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Oh. J. and Ingraham, J.

Opinion

Per Curiam.

Judgment and order reversed on facts ; new trial ordered ; costs to abide event.
